title: 1428: Shadows over Silesia - Soundtrack
description: Listen to the soundtrack, which contains most of the in-game music from 1428: Shadows over Silesia. The tracks were composed by a trio of composers - Dark Fantasy Studio, Matyas Vonz and Jan Valta. Some of the tracks are originally composed for the game.
longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
This soundtrack contains 41 mp3 files, subdivided into two discs.

TOTAL TIME: 1 hour, 31 minutes, 06 seconds
